column4: I have installed Ubuntu inside windows (wubi) which allows me to access all the data on the windows drive. Songbird allows me to import this media and it will play fine, but if i restart or shutdown the computer. When i turn it back on Songbird says it cannot access the media
wubi doesnt allow you to access your windows partition, its simply an installer program for windows to save you installing via reboot. -- can you mount the disk and read the files outside songbird?
i can access all the data on the windows part of the machine?
